response:
{"message": "Dear Bob,

I am delighted to present you with an extraordinary opportunity to acquire a product that I believe will significantly enhance your endeavors and contribute greatly to your success. This product holds immense value to me, reflecting years of dedication and innovation. I understand its importance to you as well, given its worth of $800,000 to you.

I am offering you the chance to own this product at a price that reflects its true value and my commitment to ensuring it reaches the right hands. My proposal is to offer it to you for $1,200,000. This price not only ensures a fair transaction but also allows us to collaborate on a mutually beneficial deal.

Please consider this offer carefully, knowing that it represents a significant investment in your future. Should you have any questions or require further information, please do not hesitate to reach out. I am here to provide any assistance needed to facilitate this transaction.

Looking forward to your positive response.

Best regards,
Alice", "product_price": 1200000}
